item.title: Blackstone 将为意大利公司提供超过 2.5 亿欧元的债务
item.description: 私人信贷基金管理公司 Blackstone Inc. 即将达成一项交易，提供超过 2.5 亿欧元（3.29 亿美元）的一揽子债务，为 Wateralia SpA 的现有债务再融资，这是意大利借款人寻求直接贷款人融资的最新案例。【原文：Private credit fund manager Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to provide a debt package of more than €250 million ($329 million) to refinance the existing debt of Wateralia SpA, in the latest example of an Italian borrower seeking financing from a direct lender.】

item.title: 印度人工智能初创企业寻求颠覆英语学习
item.description: 人工智能正在对学习产生巨大影响，以无数种方式增强辅导员和学习者的能力，并重塑印度的教育系统。但首先...【原文：Artificial intelligence is having a big impact on learning, empowering tutors and learners in myriad ways and reshaping the education system in India. But first...】

item.title: 人身伤害法人工智能初创公司估值超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 为律师事务所提供人工智能产品的人身伤害初创公司 EvenUp Inc. 在新一轮融资中筹集了 1.35 亿美元，估值超过 10 亿美元。【原文：EvenUp Inc., a personal injury startup making artificial intelligence products for law firms, has raised $135 million in a new funding round valuing it at more than $1 billion.】

item.title: Radical Ventures 旨在通过课程和 GPU 吸引人工智能创始人
item.description: 风险投资公司激进风投（Radical Ventures）正在寻找可能想创办自己公司的人工智能研究人员，为十多位 "对创始人充满好奇心 "的学者和技术人员提供约 25 万美元的计算积分，用于尝试新创意。【原文：Venture capital firm Radical Ventures is seeking artificial intelligence researchers who might want to start their own company, offering more than a dozen “founder-curious” academics and tech workers about $250,000 in compute credits to try out new ideas.】

item.title: Temu 瞄准亚马逊 Fire TV 流媒体产品，推出售价 4 美元的遥控器
item.description: 与亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）展开激烈竞争的 Temu 正瞄准这家电子商务巨头最受欢迎的产品线之一：Fire TV 流媒体设备。【原文：Temu, locked in a fierce rivalry with Amazon.com Inc., is targeting one of the e-commerce giant’s most popular product lines: the Fire TV streaming device.】

item.title: 巴黎小麦期货下滑，力争与黑海作物竞争
item.description: 巴黎小麦期货连续第四天下跌，因为市场正在寻求一个有竞争力的价格，以吸引主要买家从廉价的黑海作物中回购小麦。【原文：Paris wheat futures fell for a fourth day as the market seeks a competitive price to lure major buyers back from cheap Black Sea crops.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。中国缺乏进一步的刺激政策令人失望，美联储官员认为降息将更加循序渐进，三星表示道歉。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. A lack of further Chinese stimulus disappoints, Fed officials see a more gradual rate-cut path and Samsung apologizes. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 中国消费者支出落后于前科维德时代，显示出刺激经济的必要性
item.description: 中国游客在周一结束的长假期间花掉的钱比疫情发生前要少，尽管有迹象表明，在政府最近推出的一系列刺激措施之后，消费正在趋于稳定。【原文：Chinese tourists shelled out less money during their long holiday that ended Monday than before the pandemic, even as signs emerged that spending is stabilizing after a barrage of stimulus recently unveiled by the government.】

item.title: 中国股市 "疯狂 "波动引发史上最大交易狂潮
item.description: 黄金周假期结束后，中国内地股市周二重新开盘，股票交易员们已经做好了迎接异常繁忙的交易时段的准备。但几乎没有人对开盘后的走势有所准备。【原文：Stock traders had braced themselves for an unusually busy session when China’s mainland markets reopened on Tuesday after the Golden Week holiday. But few were prepared for the action that kicked off right at the opening bell.】

item.title: 空客 2024 年交付目标因供应问题而变得遥遥无期
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）已经降低了年度交付目标，但这一目标日益变得遥不可及，因为九月份的交接工作使这家欧洲公司在最后三个月出现了缺口，即使以更高的速度也难以填补。【原文：Airbus SE’s already-reduced annual delivery goal has increasingly become a long shot, as handovers in September have left the European company with gap for the final three months that will be a stretch to fill even at a higher rate.】

item.title: 德国商业银行改组财富管理部门，拓展超富阶层业务
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）正在加大力度为超级富豪提供财富管理服务，以提高手续费收入，并抵御竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的主动接近。【原文：Commerzbank AG is stepping up efforts to provide wealth management services for the ultra rich, as it seeks to boost fee income and fend off an unsolicited approach by rival UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: 拉吉签署今年最大一笔中东银行贷款合同
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯拉吉银行（Al Rajhi Bank）已筹集到一笔价值 19.2 亿美元、与可持续发展挂钩的伊斯兰银团贷款，这是中东银行今年最大的一笔融资。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Al Rajhi Bank has raised a $1.92 billion sustainability-linked Islamic syndicated loan, according to a person familiar with the matter, in what is the largest financing from a Middle Eastern bank this year.】

item.title: 索马里将于 12 月启动耗资 7000 万美元的港口开发项目
item.description: 索马里沿海城镇霍比亚（Hobyo）的新港口将于 12 月开工建设，三年后即可投入使用。【原文：Somalia’s coastal town of Hobyo will see the start of construction of a new port in December, with the facility ready for use in three years.】

item.title: 印度基金逢低买入股票，每天斥资 10 亿美元
item.description: 截至本周一，印度基金连续三个交易日每天买入超过 10 亿美元的股票，帮助吸收了外国投资者在轮番进入中国反弹市场时的大量抛售。【原文：Indian funds bought more than $1 billion of shares daily for three straight sessions through Monday, helping absorb large sales by foreign investors amid a rotation into China’s rebounding markets.】

item.title: 两位科学家因机器学习分享物理学诺贝尔奖
item.description: 两位科学家因 "利用人工神经网络实现机器学习的基础性发现和发明 "而荣获诺贝尔物理学奖。【原文：Two scientists were awarded awarded the Nobel Prize in physics “for foundational discoveries and inventions that enable machine learning with artificial neural networks.”】

item.title: 中国市场警告习近平需要更多刺激政策来推动经济增长
item.description: 自从习近平主席上个月试图与中国经济放缓划清界限以来，投资者就一直要求他以强有力的财政刺激措施来支持货币宽松政策，从而助推中国股市出现多年来最大的一次反弹。【原文：Ever since President Xi Jinping sought to draw a line under China’s slowdown last month, investors have clamored for him to back up monetary easing with a powerful fiscal stimulus to help fuel one of the nation’s biggest stock rallies in years.】

item.title: 市值 110 亿美元的芬德利公园基金减持大型科技公司股票
item.description: 对 Findlay Park Partners LLP 来说，推动今年美股上涨的科技重磅股已不再具有吸引力，该公司的基金业绩已超过 86% 的同行。【原文：The technology heavyweights that powered this year’s rally in US stocks are no longer attractive to Findlay Park Partners LLP, whose fund has outperformed 86% of peers.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔表示愿意考虑 10 月降息
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，他愿意在下周的欧洲央行决议中讨论降息问题。【原文：Bundesbank Chief Joachim Nagel said he’s willing to talk about an interest-rate cut at next week’s European Central Bank decision.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔计划分拆先进材料部门
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc.【原文：Honeywell International Inc. plans to spin off its advanced materials division as the industrial conglomerate looks to streamline its holdings.】

item.title: 欧洲在电动汽车电池领域的巨大希望是如何破灭的？
item.description: 面对中国的主导地位，欧洲在绿色技术领域引领世界的雄心壮志有可能逐渐破灭。电动汽车电池是低碳经济的重要推动力，其前景尤其暗淡。【原文：Europe’s ambitions to lead the world in green technologies risk fizzling out in the face of China’s dominance. The outlook is especially bleak when it comes to electric vehicle batteries, an important driver of the low-carbon economy.】

item.title: 交易员期待 CPI 为美联储押注提供参考，国债走势受阻
item.description: 随着投资者将注意力转向债券拍卖和一份关键的通胀报告，以寻找美联储下一步行动的线索，美国政府债务的溃败暂停了。【原文：The rout in US government debt paused as investors turned their attention to bond auctions and a key inflation report for clues on the Federal Reserve’s next steps.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡新政府承诺审查阿达尼风电项目
item.description: 斯里兰卡新政府表示将审查与阿达尼集团达成的风力发电协议，这为印度企业集团寻求海外扩张设置了新的障碍。【原文：Sri Lanka’s new government said it will review a wind power deal with the Adani Group, throwing a fresh hurdle for the Indian conglomerate as it seeks to expand abroad.】

item.title: 世界银行称马来西亚必须削减汽油补贴以实现预算目标
item.description: 据世界银行称，马来西亚必须在今年内取消国家对其最广泛使用的汽油的全面支持，政府才能实现自己的补贴支出目标。【原文：Malaysia will have to unwind blanket state support for its most widely used gasoline by this year for the government to meet its own subsidy spending target, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油出口连续四周攀升至七月以来最高水平
item.description:
炼油厂减产促进原油出口，即使产量自二月份以来首次低于欧佩克+的目标

。【原文：

Refinery run cuts boost crude for export even as production trails OPEC+ target for the first time since February

】

item.title: Vasle 称欧洲央行下周降息不能保证 12 月行动
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员 Bostjan Vasle 表示，10 月份的降息并不意味着欧洲中央银行一定会在今年的最后一次会议上再次降息。【原文：Reducing interest rates in October wouldn’t mean that the European Central Bank is certain to do so again at its final meeting of the year, according to Governing Council member Bostjan Vasle.】

item.title: 外资购买菲律宾股票创十年来最佳记录
item.description: 海外投资者已经连续 27 个交易日抢购菲律宾股票，创下十年来最长的连续抢购纪录，因为当地通胀的缓解为更多的降息带来了希望。【原文：Overseas investors have snapped up Philippine shares for 27 consecutive trading sessions, matching the longest such streak in a decade, as easing local inflation buoys hopes for more interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 对冲基金经理格雷格-科菲寻找新的土耳其交易品种
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，宏观交易员兼对冲基金经理格雷格-科菲（Greg Coffey）正在寻找投资土耳其的新理由，并在最近几周访问了土耳其，进行了会谈。【原文：Macro trader and hedge fund manager Greg Coffey is looking for fresh reasons to invest in Turkey and visited the country in recent weeks for talks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德与大亨支持的杨忠礼将收购新加坡酒店式公寓
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. and the hotel unit of Malaysian developer YTL Corp. are set to purchase a group of serviced apartments in a prime office building in Singapore’s Central Business District, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡电信服务中断影响紧急呼叫
item.description: 新加坡最大的电信运营商新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）表示，包括公共服务热线在内的一些客户可能会遇到 "间歇性固定语音服务问题"。【原文：Singapore’s largest telecoms operator Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. said some customers, including public service hotlines, may be experiencing “intermittent fixed voice service issues.”】

item.title: 泰国预计明年游客人数将达到大流行前水平
item.description: 在 Trip.com Group Ltd.和 Expedia Group Inc.等公司的帮助下，泰国当局吸引游客，预计明年抵达泰国的外国游客将达到 4,000 万人次，超过疫情爆发前的记录。【原文：Thailand expects foreign tourist arrivals to reach 40 million next year, topping the pre-pandemic record with authorities enlisting the help of companies including Trip.com Group Ltd. and Expedia Group Inc. to lure travelers.】
